amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike the $1.5 million earmark for the Maret Center project.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part C of House Report 111-209 to strike $1.5 million in funding for the `Maret Center' and reduce the overall cost of the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A013) Failed by recorded vote: 89 - 338 (Roll no. 582).
